WorkItem.Description:
I got the following exception message when trying to serialize an AdjacencyGraph object:
 
The InnerException message was 'The constructor with parameters (SerializationInfo, StreamingContext) is not found in ISerializable type 'QuickGraph.AdjacencyGraph`2+VertexEdgeDictionary'  *snip*
 
VertexEdgeDictionary dervies from Dictionary<K,V> which implements ISerializable and the required constructor with (SerializationInfo, StreamingContext) parameters.  VertexEdgeDictionary does not have such constructor and I believe addition of such, passing the parameters to the base class constructor, will allow AdjacencyGraph to serialize itself correctly.

Comments.Message:
Apologies!

I should've first checked your latest release in which you have already fixed this problem.

Excellent work.  Please close this work item.
